TABLE.NAME: local_imtt
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the main table for the IMTT plugin.

FIELD.NAME: provider_name
FIELD.COMMENT: This is going to be the service provider we are connecting with. For example: google, facebook, etc...

FIELD.NAME: provider_access_token
FIELD.COMMENT: This is going to be the OAuth access token for this particular integration.

FIELD.NAME: configuration_json
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a JSON-encoded configuration for the IMTT plugin

FIELD.NAME: event_names
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a string that will allow us to filter any IMTT instances based on which event they listen for inside Moodle. It should be a space-delimited list of Moodle events, for example: "\mod_quiz\event\attempt_started \mod_quiz\event\attempt_submitted"
